summary: Experienced Brand Manager with a history of working in the B2B pharmaceutical events across European, Japanese, Chinese, Korean, Middle East, and Russian markets. Responsible for developing brand strategies, promoting the brand, drive revenue and business growth.  Skilled at formulating and implementing a brand strategy by implementing brand plans and using variety of data to drive volume and profitability. Strong Product and Project management professional, skilled in Brand and Digital Strategy, Event Management, and Market Research.

treasury_media.title: CPhI China Success Provides Encouragement for 2021 Events and Boon for Industry
treasury_media.description: CPhI China event organizers are encouraged by the success of the recent event and claim that it demonstrates a reassuring return to form for pharma events in 2021, which will also fuel a boom for the industry.

treasury_media.title: CPhI & P-MEC China gives a glimpse of the success returning pharma events will deliver in 2021
treasury_media.description: The recently hosted CPhI & P-MEC China 2020 – organized by Informa Markets and CCCMHPIE and co-organized by Shanghai Sinoexpo Informa Markets International Exhibition Co., Ltd. – attracted a remarkable 46,157 visits of professional pharma visitors,...

certifications.name: UFI Female Leadership
certifications.authority: UFI, The Global Association of the Exhibition Industry

company.name: UFI, The Global Association of the Exhibition Industry

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for the management and development of the B2B Pharmaceutical event Pharmapack, previously  CPhI Japan and  CPhI China, previously CPhI Korea,  CPhI Russia and CPhI Istanbul.  

My role comprises of four key components: strategy and growth; excellence and innovation; operational leadership and building communities & eminence. Aligned with these areas of focus, I have responsibility for and I’m performance managed against the financial, operational and customer performance and position of my brands. I’m responsible of the Profit & Loss account of my brands. I work collaboratively with but are not directly responsible for the Sales, Marketing, Operations, Finance and Customer Insight teams.

My main responsibilities:
-	Set and deliver the brands three-year strategy, and the objectives contained within the strategy
-	Support on the identification of growth opportunities for brands within the portfolio
-	Deliver on financial, operational and customer oriented- brand objectives 
-	Understand market to manage the brand, laying out its vision and competitive position
-	Support the development of brand pricing strategies, based on strategic layout of an event space, product bundling options, value based pricing and commercial drivers 
-	Support on the design and delivery of outstanding customer experience
-	Work with Marketing to come up with creative and new ideas to engage customers at and around an event
-	Support on the interpretation of customer insight, based on industry conversations and data, supported by Marketing and Customer Insights to evolve event relevance and value 
-	Manage the brand P&L in collaboration with global partners, JVs and Finance 
-	Provide accurate and timely reporting of brand KPIs and forecasts
-	Manage the day to day relationships with brand joint venture, ensuring the overall brand is represented, connected and being managed globally across all geographies.

Project Manager

profile_positions.description: Responsible of marketing activities for digital products (directories, websites, mobile apps, online community) of UBM Live’s leading brands. As a digital executive I launched 7 event mobile apps, managed onsite activities/marketing for CPhI Worldwide and Fi Europe exhibitions.
